title: Seep Pop-up Eco Cleaning Sponges - For Kitchen Bathroom Dishwashing Washing Up - Plastic Free - 100% Natural Cellulose - Compostable - 6 Pack
features: SEEP THE ENVIRONMENTAL BRAND YOU CAN TRUST - The team at SEEP have partnered with climate charity ''On A Mission'' to take responsibility for our impact on the Earth. On A Mission is helping us reduce and offset our carbon emissions so we are officially a ''Climate Positive'' company. We're proud to partner with On A Mission and support their fantastic reforestation projects.

ECO-FRIENDLY COMPOSTABLE NATURAL LOOFAH SPONGES - Finally, all of your wiping-up dreams have come true __. Our Eco Pop-Up Sponges are perfect for wiping up spills, offering absorbency and durability. What starts out as a flat paper-like sponge transforms into a 100 Percent compostable cellulose sponge when run under the tap. Just watch it 'pop'! Plus, if you thought this little sponge couldn't get much better, it's made in the UK.

COMPOSTABLE POP-UP SPONGES MADE IN THE UK - 100 Percent compostable and biodegradable these natural cleaning sponges are perfect for most indoor and general cleaning. Use for dishwashing, wiping down kitchen surfaces and cleaning bathrooms. SEEP Eco sponges for super-soft and non-abrasive.

MANUFACTURED USING SUSTAINABLY SOURCED WOOD PULP FROM THE UK - SEEP living is always thinking ahead about how we can sustainably make our range of cleaning products better than others. These 100 Percent sustainably sourced cellulose wood pulp eco-sponges are 100 Percent plastic and are home compostable.

JOIN THE SEEP MOVEMENT - Your order of these eco-sponges replace the need for those horrible virgin plastic sponges that go into landfill or incineration plants. SEEP products support our charity partners with their reforestation projects. We are officially a ''Climate Positive Company''. All our products are eco-friendly and sustainable.
description: Product Description Eco Sponges Made from wood pulp cellulose and loofah plant, our plastic-free sponges are non-scratch, highly absorbent, machine washable, and long lasting. At end of life, they’ll break down harmlessly. Eco Cloths Made from bamboo, our plastic-free cloths can be used wet or dry, perfect for wiping, dusting and polishing. At end of life, they can be repurposed with other textiles. Eco Bin Bags Made from plant-based bio-polymer Mater Bi, our plastic-free bin bags are approved for local authority collection. All materials and energy used are 100% renewable.
